Doctor-led personalised treatment

Acne

A holistic, doctor-guided treatment plan that targets internal triggers such as hormones, digestion, stress, and inflammation to permanently reduce acne and prevent future breakouts.

How It Works
Doctor-led personalised treatment
Root-cause based acne control

How Our Treatment Works

A medically guided step-by-step plan tailored for this condition.

Hormonal & Internal Balancing

Helps regulate hormonal fluctuations, inflammation and oil gland activity responsible for acne.

Gut Health & Detox Support

Improves digestion, reduces acne-causing toxins and enhances nutrient absorption.

Lifestyle, Diet & Stress Healing

Reduces triggers such as sugar, stress, late nights, and poor skincare habits.

What’s Causing This Condition?

We diagnose underlying triggers and address the root causes, not just symptoms.

Hormonal Fluctuation

Increased androgen activity raises oil secretion, leading to acne.

Excess Sebum Production

Oily skin clogs pores and triggers acne formation.

Gut Imbalance

Poor digestion leads to toxin buildup, which surfaces as acne.

Stress

Stress hormones increase oil levels and inflammation.

Bacterial Overgrowth

P. Acnes bacteria infect clogged pores, causing redness and swelling.

Common Symptoms

Symptoms vary from person to person — here are the most commonly reported ones.

Whiteheads

Blackheads

Painful cystic acne

Red swollen pimples

Dark spots & pigmentation

Acne scars

Oily or greasy skin

Frequently Asked Questions

Clear answers to the most common questions about our holistic, doctor-guided treatment programs.

Is homeopathy effective for hair fall?

Yes. It treats internal causes such as stress, hormones and digestion for long-term regrowth.

How long before I see results?

Most patients experience fall control within 3–4 weeks and new growth from 5–10 weeks.

Is this treatment safe for women?

100% safe for PCOS, postpartum, thyroid-related hair fall and hormonal imbalance.

How is Modern Clinic different?

We combine Homeopathy, Nutrition and Stress Healing to correct the root cause naturally.
